    • Method Detail

      • htmlTidy

        public static nu.xom.Document htmlTidy(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        reads HTML in inputStream and tidies it. First with HTML tidy (using as many cleaning options as possible then excises the DOCTYP and namespace from result Tidy may throw warnings and errors to syserr than cannot be removed from console
        Parameters:
        inputStream - if null throws IOException
        Returns:
        document with some HTML root element
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
